Pleated pants carry with them a sense of both ease and sophistication. I think that’s really impressive because, to my mind, that ease and sophistication are difficult to get to fit together. You need to find clothes that hang off your body naturally and comfortably as well as look classy as hell. And that’s exactly what the best pleated pants for men can do. Although pleated pants spent a long time outside of the men’s fashion limelight, they’ve come back in a big way in the past couple of years. Nobody is wearing skinny jeans or tight, tailored slacks; everyone is switching over to the loose, flowing pants that you see on the streets and on Instagram. In this article, we’re going to go on a deep dive into 5 of the best pleated pants for men that you can order online today. I’d say it’s high time to add some of these classic fits to your wardrobe. Let’s jump right into the list. Key Takeaways Men’s pleated pants are a really hot topic these days, so I searched through hundreds of product listings to come up with the final version of this list. It’s not like I did all that in one day—I’ve been following the category for quite some time. I’ve even ordered a couple of these myself and tried on a few more. Overall, the best pleated pants for men are the Adriano Goldschmied Men’s The Rutger Relaxed Pleated Pant. Inspired by the classic styles of the past yet containing just enough of a refresh to feel modern, these are a pair of pants that anyone would be pleased to own. I’ve also included an option that truly revives the past of pleated pants, the PJ PAUL JONES Men Vintage Tweed Pants, as well as a more modern take that reimagines what pleated pants can look like (the Floerns Men’s Slant Pocket Pleated Trousers). Pleated pants carry with them a sense of both ease and sophistication. I think that’s really impressive because, to my mind, that ease and sophistication are difficult to get to fit together. You need to find clothes that hang off your body naturally and comfortably as well as look classy as hell. And that’s exactly what the best pleated pants for men can do.

Although pleated pants spent a long time outside of the men’s fashion limelight, they’ve come back in a big way in the past couple of years. Nobody is wearing skinny jeans or tight, tailored slacks; everyone is switching over to the loose, flowing pants that you see on the streets and on Instagram.

In this article, we’re going to go on a deep dive into 5 of the best pleated pants for men that you can order online today. I’d say it’s high time to add some of these classic fits to your wardrobe.

Let’s jump right into the list.

Key Takeaways

Men’s pleated pants are a really hot topic these days, so I searched through hundreds of product listings to come up with the final version of this list. It’s not like I did all that in one day—I’ve been following the category for quite some time. I’ve even ordered a couple of these myself and tried on a few more.

Overall, the best pleated pants for men are the Adriano Goldschmied Men’s The Rutger Relaxed Pleated Pant. Inspired by the classic styles of the past yet containing just enough of a refresh to feel modern, these are a pair of pants that anyone would be pleased to own.

I’ve also included an option that truly revives the past of pleated pants, the PJ PAUL JONES Men Vintage Tweed Pants, as well as a more modern take that reimagines what pleated pants can look like (the Floerns Men’s Slant Pocket Pleated Trousers).

Who are these for? Since there are so many ways to wear these men’s pleated pants, I’d make the argument that just about any man can find a way to wear them.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: The pants aren’t pure cotton, containing about 35% other fabrics, which some people might dislike but I don’t have a problem with. I can say from personal experience that these pants feel really great to the touch and to wear.
